articles.author: Kali Hays
articles.title: X is closing San Francisco HQ and relocating staffers to San Jose
articles.description: In a note to staffers on Monday, X CEO Linda Yaccarino provided the first details of the move since Elon Musk said the company formerly known as Twitter was moving its headquarters to Texas.
articles.content: X, the social media company formerly known as Twitter, is set to leave San Francisco in the coming weeks.In a Monday email from Linda Yaccarino, the CEO of X appointed last year by owner Elon Musk, X… [+2856 chars]

articles.author: Chloe Berger
articles.title: A sacred 13,000 year old tree faces off with a California real estate development
articles.description: The clonal colony nestled in the Jurupa Mountains might have a new and polarizing neighbor: a housing and industrial project
articles.content: While the Jurupa Oak is ancient, its no feeble thing. Living in Riverside County, California, the tree has beat the dry heat by growing with it as it proliferates after being touched by wildfires. Bu… [+3301 chars]

articles.author: Sydney Lake
articles.title: U.S. real estate is so expensive it’s even keeping out wealthy foreign homebuyers
articles.description: Foreign buyers haven’t purchased so few homes since 2009—15 years ago.

articles.author: Neil Callanan, Bloomberg
articles.title: Don’t expect lower rates to save debt-burdened office buildings
articles.description: More than $94 billion of US commercial real estate is currently distressed, according to MSCI Real Assets, with a further $201 billion at risk of slipping into that category.
